title: Crockpot Applesauce BBQ Chicken
directions: Spray Crockpot with non-stick cooking spray, or use a Crockpot liner for easy clean-up.
Mix all remaining ingredients together, and pour over chicken.
Cook 6-8 hours on low setting. Serves
***If FREEZING, place all ingredients in gallon-sized freezer bag. Freeze. Thaw overnight in refrigerator prior to placing into slow cooker.***
ingredients: 2/3 cup BBQ sauce (I used Brown Sugar/Hickory)
